attributes.action: The Queen should not assent to a bill requiring a referendum on EU membership.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom has already voted to leave the EU. The will of the people must be respected and implemented.The Queen should refuse to assent to any bill requiring a second referendum.

rejection.details:
The granting of royal assent is not something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for. 

The decision whether to grant royal assent to an act of parliament is a matter for the Queen, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

However, you may like to sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226071
